iNote 2.0 is now with multi platform cloud sync and fully optimized M1 experience. Significantly optimized data backup performance speed up to 100 times 6 new app icons for iNote Pro 3 new notebook covers Other improvements and optimizations !!! If you encounter any data errors or loss after the upgrade please do not delete the app please contact us immediately at lucky clover.ly and we will provide you with one on one data recovery guidance thank you for your support and understanding.

iNote 2.0 is now with multi platform cloud sync and fully optimized M1 experience. Multi platform Cloud Sync: industry leading conflict free real time sync supporting iPhone iPad M1 Mac Devices Customizable tab bar: adjust the sort of tabs Keyboard shortcuts: redesigned keyboard shortcuts Optimized for M1 Mac: Exclusive menu bar shortcuts top toolbar file export elegant desktop experience Long press on camera icon for iOS devices to add pictures from System Files App Note List now supports Sort by Title Significantly optimize the list sorting efficiency Optimize the issue that may cause the creation of notes to lag Fixed the issue that deleting records in certain cases will cause a crash Fixed the issue that the notebook widget cannot display custom cover. !!! If you encounter any data errors or loss after the upgrade please do not delete the app please contact us immediately at lucky clover.ly and we will provide you with one on one data recovery guidance thank you for your support and understanding.

Massive iOS 14 and iPad compatibility improvements and fixes: Support for New Resolution of iPhone 12 Series XDR Super Retina Display Support for Select Some Photos permissions in iOS 14 Optimize keyboard interaction for full screen text editor Fix issue where tapping the toolbar button would cause the toolbar to hide on iOS 14 Fix issue where iNote files could not be shared via AirDrop when title or content contained some special characters Fix an issue where the iOS 14 standalone editor might cause the keyboard to close when selecting text Fix the issue where rotating the iPad would cause the keyboard to hide Other detail improvements and optimizations

iNote is fully updated New dot and number list style New group marks and citation styles Automatic backup function to safely backup your data to iCloud Text style menu optimization Details stability improvements

Thank you for your support since the release of iNote. We will take your feedback and comments seriously. Two new notification center widgets The Shortcut widget helps you quickly create new notes or save clipboard to notes The My Notes widget uses card mode to easily browse notes Fixed an issue where iPad could fail to import backup files Fixed an issue where list notes display might be incomplete Fixed an issue that could cause the program to crash when creating a notebook Details improvement and optimization
